Class Grid

java.lang.Object
com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.Mesh
com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.proceduralmesh.ProceduralMesh
com.marginallyclever.ro3.mesh.proceduralmesh.Grid
public class Grid extends ProceduralMesh

Grid is a Mesh displaying a grid on the XY plane. The origin is at the center of the grid.
